name: Do Anything
description:
Created for Molyjam 2013 based on this quote:

If you really were free to do anything in the world, I think you'd end up being confused, and that's a very interesting point, a design point, actually.
-- Peter Molyneux

Featured on Rock Paper Shotgun and PC Gamer.

Three years later, this is the second dumbest game I've ever made (I think Danny Dorito is just slightly dumber), so I'm putting it on itch.io for posterity.
